about_the_game:
Sleep Tight is a fast paced action horror game. Can you survive the nights?

LISTEN CLOSELY - There is a new monster that comes out with every night, some monsters have special traits and require different methods to stop them.



PAY ATTENTION - Use your weapons to help against the onslaught of monsters coming towards you!



DON'T LET THEM GET YOU - Once you get hit three times it'll be all over!

highlighted.name: You are now a pro Cuddler :)
